name: MIRROR MIRROR (dis0rder)
description:
Submission for  BenBonk Gamejam #3

Theme: Two Sides

Created in 32 hours from scratch

No 3rd party assets were used

All content created by Dis0rder

- June 2021 -

---

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Flip Mirror / Move spectre

Z - Jump

Enter - Confirm

N - Toggle NOISE - effect (On/Off)

ESC - Quit game

---

I'll be adding a browser-build soon!
